title: Adobe Color
description: Free tool that allows you to create color palettes based on color theory. It offers a color wheel to apply harmony rules and generate custom combinations.

title: Coolors
description: Online color palette generator that allows you to create combinations quickly. Its intuitive interface makes it easy to explore different color schemes.

title: Color Hunt
description: Platform offering a large collection of handmade color palettes, ideal for inspiration and finding harmonious combinations.

title: Paletton
description: Online tool for creating color palettes based on traditional color theory principles, such as monochromes, triads, and tetrads.

title: Khroma
description: Color palette generator that uses artificial intelligence to suggest custom combinations based on user preferences.

title: Canva Colors
description: Part of the Canva platform, it offers tools for generating color palettes, including the ability to extract colors from images and explore popular combinations.

title: ColorSpace
description: Color combination generator that allows you to create gradients and explore palettes based on an initial color.

title: Muzli Colors
description: Tool that makes it easy to create color schemes and preview how they would look in user interfaces.
